r.s: A test runner for Test Driven Development
r.d: Stagehand_TestRunner provides a test runner to run unit tests. Stagehand_TestRunner strongly supports Test Driven Development by various features.
r.n:
What's New in Stagehand_TestRunner 2.14.0
Supports CakePHP. (Issue #212)
The testing framework of CakePHP has been supported. For more information, see the User Guide.
Supports the PHPUnit XML configuration file. (Issue #202)
The PHPUnit XML configuration file has been supported. For more information, see the User Guide.
Supports Web Page Testing. (Issue #222)
Web Page Testing by WebTestCase (SimpleTest), CakeWebTestCase (CakePHP) has been supported.
Specifies the test file suffix. (Issue #211)
The suffix of your test files can be specified by a regular expression literal. For more information, see the User Guide.
Three Defect Fixes The following defects have been fixed:
* An error Warning: DOMDocument::createElement(): unterminated entity reference is raised if a failure/error message contains ampersands. (Issue #215) * An invalid XML is generated if a test case is skipped by the @depends annotations. (Issue #216) * An invalid XML is generated when multiple failures are included in a single test. (Issue #219)
